title: The Battle Over Critical Race Theory (feat. Kimberlé Crenshaw) - Beyond the Scenes
itunes:title: The Battle Over Critical Race Theory (feat. Kimberlé Crenshaw) - Beyond the Scenes
description:
Professor Kimberlé Crenshaw and producer CJ Hunt join Roy Wood Jr. to break down what critical race theory actually is and discuss the threat posed by the blowback against it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
